name: marketmesh-full
description: MarketMesh full stack (backend + Angular frontend) - MEAN Stack

scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npm --prefix backend start
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,ANGULAR -c green,cyan "npm --prefix backend start" "npm --prefix frontend-angular start"
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend-angular install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend-angular && npm install && ng build --configuration=production
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend-angular install
